mapper.select: SELECT s.userId,s.mobilePhone,t.storeName,t.userName,t.phone,s.locked FROM sys_user s LEFT JOIN t_store t ON s.userId=t.userId WHERE s.userId = #{userId}

SELECT s.storeName storeName,s.userName userName,s.idCard idCard,s.phone phone,s.area area,s.address address, s.frontPic frontPic,s.backPic backPic,s.licensePic licensePic,s.frontStorePic frontStorePic,s.innerStorePic innerStorePic, b.bankType bankType,b.accountType accountType,b.userName bankUserName,b.oprateType oprateType,b.cardNumber cardNumber, b.idType idType,b.idCard cIdCard,b.remark remark FROM t_store s LEFT JOIN t_bankCard b ON s.userId=b.userId WHERE s.userId=#{userId}
SELECT o.payTime payTime,o.totalPrice,s.remain FROM t_order o JOIN t_store s ON o.userId=s.userId WHERE 1=1 AND o.userId=#{relationMap.userId}>
